Class battlePets

java.lang.Object
group33.VirtualPet.src.main.model.battlePets
public class battlePets extends Object
Represents a battle pet with attributes for math combat in the Virtual Pet game. Each battle pet has a type, health points, and mathematical statistics used in battles.
Since:
Winter 2025
Author:
Team 33 (Dhir, Kostya, Fatima, Anna)

  • Constructor Details

    • battlePets

      public battlePets(String type, int health, int[][] stats)
      Constructs a new battle pet with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      type - The classification/name of the pet (e.g., "jellyfish")
      health - The initial health points (typically 100)
      stats - The 2D array of math problem statistics

  • Method Details

    • setType

      public void setType(String type)
      Sets the type/classification of the battle pet.
      Parameters:
      type - The new type to assign to the pet

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the current type/classification of the battle pet.
      Returns:
      The pet's type as a String

    • setHealth

      public void setHealth(int health)
      Sets the current health points of the battle pet.
      Parameters:
      health - The new health value (should be between 0-100)

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Gets the current health points of the battle pet.
      Returns:
      The current health value

    • setStat

      public void setStat(int i, int j, int x)
      Updates a specific value in the pet's stats array.
      Parameters:
      i - The row index in the stats 2D array
      j - The column index in the stats 2D array
      x - The new value to set at the specified position

    • getStat

      public int[][] getStat()
      Gets the complete 2D array of battle statistics.
      Returns:
      The current stats array containing math problems
